features.featureTitle: Completely replace the contents of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact V24 “OMEGA SINGULARITY” code provided by the user, treating it as the full application UI (Landing → Client → Pro/GenesisEngine) and preserving the provided components, local `DATA`, Tailwind classes, imports, and interaction logic (including Framer Motion `layoutId` morphing, the orbital CoreNav, the category slider, and the Vantablack aesthetic).

Ensure the project compiles and runs after the V24 `AppV1.jsx` overwrite by applying only minimal mechanical fixes required by this repository (e.g., missing/incorrect imports, unresolved symbols, invalid JSX, duplicate `export default`), without changing the intended UI design, copy, or interaction behavior from the provided V24 code.
